channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+1625] They'll Regret This The Next Morning... (PIC)
[+1534] This Dog Just Watched Inception (PIC)
item.description: This is pretty much on par with how I looked for the 24 hours after I saw the movie too..until I could go back and see it again.

item.title: [+1513] Justin Bieber Gets Nailed By a Watrer Bottle
item.description: Justin Bieber stops a flying water bottle with his head.

item.title: [+1078] Einstein's Letter To Roosevelt: Why We Created the Atom Bomb
item.description: Albert Einstein sent the following letter to President Roosevelt in 1939. The fear of Germans acquiring nuclear technology, espoused here,is considered to be the motivation to the U.S.' creation of the atomic bomb.

item.title: [+1022] This kid is thinking that his dad is pretty weird (Pic)
[+975] Stephen Hawking Predicts the End of Humanity, Again
item.description: Stephen Hawking, brilliant astrophysicist and nefarious alien doomsday prophet, is again atop his soapbox preaching the end of humanity should we not board spaceships and colonize the solar system and beyond.

item.title: [+919] Wait Stop, I Think I See Something... (PIC)
[+909] Republican Party Starts to Kill Its Own
item.description: The current Republican Party, one hijacked by hustlers and extremists, not only looks to destroy President Obama. It even starts to kill its own. Rep. Bob Inglis, a voice of reason at a dumb, unreasonable time in American politics, is one of them.

item.title: [+833] 5 UFO Sightings That Even Non-Crazy People Find Creepy
item.description: Are these UFOs alien? We're not saything that. We're just saying they're really, really weird.

item.title: [+776] America Goes Dark
item.description: With infrastructure and education crumbling, we’re on the unlit, unpaved road to nowhere.

item.title: [+732] Cats During Emergencies [comic]
[+723] Team Fortress 2D (pic)
item.description: This is how Team Fortress would look in 2D glory.

item.title: [+621] Almost Naked Lady Gaga Groped While Crowd-Surfing (w/ video)
item.description: (Slightly NSFW) Gaga surprised Semi Precious Weapons fans by joining the band on-stage during their performance and causing a near riot. Wearing little more than fishnet stockings and strategic golden pasties, Gaga rocked out on drums before stage diving into the unsuspecting crowd and, to the dismay of her bodyguard, crowd surfing around for a bit

item.title: [+601] It only delays: the frustrations of Sony's PS3 firmware
item.description: The PlayStation 3 is a wonderful system filled with great games, but the constant, contentless, mandatory firmware updates and slow download speeds sometimes makes it feel as if you can do everything on the system but game. The story of one wasted afternoon inside.

item.title: [+497] What to do on a flight from New York to Berlin?
item.description: Christoph Niemann draws his thoughts about about plane travel. Included is a special guest appearance from good old George Carlin at the end of the post to complete the feeling ;-)

item.title: [+493] Unlicensed NES Cartridges Exposed! (Video)
[+481] Woman Excited About Sister's Arrest On Live TV (Video)
item.description: "County Law! County Law!" This lady is extremely excited about appearing on this locally produced COPS knockoff. I bet instead of calling a lawyer for her sister, she called an agent.

item.title: [+477] Engineers Turn Robot Arm into F1 Ferrari Simulator [VID]
item.description: Engineers are one hell of a breed. They can literally turn anything in to well...anything. The engineers at Max Planck Institute for Biological Cybernetics, in Tübingen, Germany have turned a robotic arm in to a F1 Ferrari Simulator.

item.title: [+475] Some great workplace hilarity
item.description: Since for the majority of you tomorrow is Monday which means returning to the cubicle farm for another five days of boredom and finding ways to waste time

item.title: [+471] "Four Chicks in a Hot Tub." Not what I was expecting.
